item.title: What's open on New Year's Day 2026? See which stores are operating.
item.description: Plan ahead as banks, post offices and major stock exchanges will be closed in observance of the federal holiday.

item.title: New Year's celebrations welcome 2026 around the world. See the photos.
item.description: New Zealand and Australia were among the first to welcome 2026, but in Sydney and some other cities, the festivities are tinged by grief.

item.title: Dozens feared dead as fire hits New Year's revelers in Swiss Alps bar
item.description: Police in Switzerland say a fire at a bar in the Crans-Montana ski resort area is believed to have left "several tens of people" dead and dozens more ...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani sworn in at abandoned NYC subway station, becoming city's 112th mayor

item.title: 7/11: CBS Morning News
item.description: ICE raids at California cannabis farms turn violent; Fired Justice Department official warns of retribution inside agency.
